department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Elevator maintenance contract for Maurice Lamontagne Institute
description: The contractor is expected to provide elevator maintenance services, including inspection, testing, and software updates for the elevators located at the Maurice Lamontagne Institute. The contractor is also expected to provide all necessary tools, equipment, and materials.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
======================
### Title
EE517- 241724 Elevating Device Maintenance General Requirement

### Reference Number
WS4430498708-Doc4438216250

### Tender Closing Date
2024-03-26T14:00:00 (EXTINISHED)

### Solicitation Number
WS4430498708

### Tender Status
Expiring

### Tender Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for monthly elevator maintenance services. The successful bidder will provide all necessary tools, equipment, materials, labor, inspection, testing, software updates, and improvements for the elevators located at the Maurice Lamontagne Institute (IML) in Mont-Joli, QC.

### Contract Requirements
The contract will be awarded to the bidder who submits the lowest priced proposal that meets all the requirements as specified in the RFP documents.

### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to bidders who are registered under the following trade agreements: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.

### Regions of Opportunity
Quebec (except NCR), is where the tender opportunities are located.

**Contact Information**
--------------------

### Name
Samuel Pearson (PWGSC)
### Email
samuel.pearson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
### Phone
Not available

### Information Materials
All information related to this tender can be accessed online through the official website: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19066695?extsite=MTkwNjY2OTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==. Please note that all communications in English and French are available.

### Place of Work
Maurice Lamontagne Institute, 850 Route de la Mer, Mont-Joli, QC. Note that some instructions may be detailed in Annex F of the original documentation.  [closed tender] (Please do not respond by now.) 
### Terms of Reference 
The closing date for this RFP has expired. All other interested submitter bidders should please do not respond. 

PERSONNEL RESPONSIBLE OF THE TENDER MANAGEMENT WILL TAKE THE RESPONSABILITE OF THE FIRST COMING DATE THAT FOLLOW TO RESTART CALLING BY COMPLE
